overview: A TV version of the novel by Eliza Orzeszkowa. The love story of Justyna Orzelska and Janek Bohatyrowicz is presented against the background of the history of two noble families: Korczy≈Ñski and Bohatyrowicz. Will the feelings of young people, which have grown beyond divisions, allow them to overcome socio-economic as well as political and historical problems?
title: Nad niemnem
